subject: feat(debug): add floating debug banner with diagnostics and event log
body:
Replace the single-button EmailDebugModal with a proper debug system
modeled after PWADebugBanner from another project. The system has three
parts:

1. debugLog utility (src/utils/debugLog.ts) — pub/sub in-memory event
   store capped at 200 entries. Global singleton so logs survive
   component re-renders. Any module can call debugLog() to emit events.

2. DebugBanner component (src/components/DebugBanner.tsx) — floating
   pill on the bottom-right that expands to a two-tab panel:
   - Diagnostics tab: runs health checks (HTTPS, network, API URL
     config, API reachability, service worker, install state, user agent)
   - Event Log tab: real-time color-coded entries from InterestForm
     (info=gray, success=green, warn=amber, error=red) with expandable
     details and source labels
   Controls: re-run diagnostics, clear log, copy-all-to-clipboard, close
   Clipboard fallback: shows selectable textarea if API fails on mobile

3. InterestForm integration — emits debugLog events at each lifecycle
   point: submit, request, response-ok, response-error, timeout,
   fetch-failed, api-url-missing, honeypot-triggered

Activated via ?debug=true URL parameter. Hidden from regular users.
The "Copy All" button produces a complete plain-text report (environment
+ full event log) formatted for pasting into another session.
